actions.name: Chromatic Radiance
actions.description: Connection - Sacred Fire.  Effect: When using a Fire-Type attack while Sunny Weather is active, the user recovers 3 ticks of HP. Any time the user recovers HP, allies within 10m recover a Tick of HP, which is doubled in Sunny Weather.
